front.title: Imperial Squad Leader
front.gametext: Adds 1 to forfeit of your other troopers at same site. When moving with a 'squad' of exactly three other troopers, all four move for 1 Force. Imperial Trooper Guards at same site may move.
front.lore: Captain Mod Terrik, a typical officer of the Desert Sands sandtrooper unit. Fearless and highly motivated. Willing to sacrifice as many troops as necessary.

rulings: When about to move, may target other troopers/guards to move with him.
Does not permit the other troopers/guards to perform a move they are not otherwise able to make.
Suspends the 'cannot move' text on Imperial Trooper Guards at same site.
